I am a day-trading novice and am starting this blog to document progress. I am hoping that writing this blog will force me to be more analytical and learn from my failures and successes.

Das Trader Hotkeys

This is a living list of DAS Trader hot keys, last updated on April 10th, 2016.

Alt and Numberpad + key - Alt and Numberpad - key -

You can download my hotkey file here

ShortCut Command Description
CTRL-ESC right-aligned $1600
col 2 is centered $12
zebra stripes are neat $1
newer → ← older
